item.title: RBLX
item.description: score:187 Chances: Roblox and Paycom could be poised for massive rebounds in 2024. This growth stock is giving developers artificial intelligence tools to optimize their creations. U.S. videogame makers have never been masters of their own destiny in the Chinese market. A cadre of quietly thriving companies has been making significant strategic strides in a market where giants often grab the spotlight.
